CustomField.formula: CASE( Region__c, 'Inland Empire', 'Inland Empire', 'Los Angeles', 'Los Angeles', 'Sacramento', 'Sacramento', 'Seattle', 'Seattle', 'Las Vegas', 'Las Vegas', 'Charlotte', 'Charlotte', 'Chicago', CASE ( Portfolio__r.Property_State__c , 'MN', 'Minneapolis', 'Chicago'), 'Atlanta','Atlanta', 'Tampa','Tampa', 'Miami','Miami', 'Jacksonville','Jacksonville', 'Orlando','Orlando', 'Phoenix','Phoenix', null)
CustomField.label: Subregion
